title: Submit a Required Environmental Report
description: A manufacturing company is submitting its annual water usage report to the state environmental protection agency.

tasks.description: Identify the company and the specific report they need to file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the company and the correct reporting form.

tasks.description: Guide the user through the online portal to input their water usage data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the user accurately populate the report fields.

tasks.description: Accept the report submission and provide a confirmation number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the submission and provides a receipt.
